caption.p: Schematic representation of the “Cytokine storm” development after SARS-CoV-2 infection. The presence of SARS-CoV-2 in the lung induces an uncontrolled generalized immune response. Several immune cells (like T-lymphocytes, macrophages and dendritic cells) sustain the impressive secretion of cytokines and chemokines ultimately leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
